name: Daniel Gildea
content: Daniel Gildea Daniel Gildea Professor, Computer Science, University of Rochester. Member, Center for Language Sciences and Institute for Data Science. 3019 Wegmans Hall office hours: Tu/Th 2-3pm I'm interested in statistical approaches to natural language processing, in particular for the tasks of machine translation and language understanding.
